Title: S5 Ep. 201 Evan and Zack Ernst
Description:
Evan and Zack Ernst are brothers that started Who We Play For. This episode is an inspiring story and why they started the organization. While in high school, one of their good friends that played football died. It was preventable and drove their passion to make a difference in the world of athletes globally.     

The The Intern Whisperer Podcast is brought to you by Employers 4 Change - Improving #Skills based #diversity #recruitment and #management for #interns and #employees alike.
